nodes.text: The Azumels were a sentient species that existed within the galaxy. Argus Panox was a member of this species.
The Azumel were a species of gray, mottled brown, or tan colored skin. They had six eyes which varied in color from blue to green or orange. They also had four fingers on each hand.
An Azumel was present in a bar on the planet Telerath when Jango Fett and Boba Fett met with bounty hunters.
During the Clone Wars, an Azumel was a stagehand aboard Risha Synata's ship.
Argus Panox was a male Azumel played during Lando Calrissian and Han Solo's first sabacc game on the planet Vandor.
Makkeer was an Azumel who discovered the location of hidden treasure by the pirate queen Rane Mahal.
